src:
Šibek potresni sunek v bližini Tolmina
01 Nov 2019, 09:49 by STA

Seizmografi državne mreže potresnih opazovalnic so v četrtek ob 18.47 zabeležili šibek potresni sunek, magnitude 1,4. Po prvih podatkih je bilo žarišče potresa 67 kilometrov zahodno od Ljubljane, v bližini Tolmina.



Fotografija je simbolična. Foto: STA

SLOVENIJA > Intenziteta potresa v širšem nadžariščnem območju ni presegla III. stopnje po evropski potresni lestvici, potres pa so čutili posamezni prebivalci tolminske in kobariške občine, so še sporočili iz Urada za seizmologijo in geologijo pri Agenciji RS za okolje.
text:
A weak earthquake near Tolmin
01 Nov 2019, 09:49 by STA

Seismographs of the National Earthquake Observation Network recorded a weak earthquake of magnitude 1.4 at 18.47 on Thursday. According to initial data, the focus of the earthquake was 67 kilometers west of Ljubljana, near Tolmin.



Photography is symbolic. Photo: STA

SLOVENIA> The magnitude of the earthquake in the broader focal area did not exceed III. The earthquake was measured by the European earthquake scale, and the earthquake was felt by individual residents of the Tolmin and Kobarid municipalities, the Agency for Seismology and Geology at the Environmental Agency said.
